1.subject: Mathematics
1.name: Sine Law
1.question: In \( \triangle ABC \), \( AB = 8 cm \), \( BC = 5 cm \), and \( \angle CAB = 20^\circ \). Find \( \angle ACB \) and \( AC \).

2.text:
\[
\begin{align*}
\text{By the sine law,}& \\
\frac{AC}{sin{126.823^\circ}} &\approx \frac{5 cm}{sin{20^\circ}} \\
AC &\approx \underline{\underline{11.7 cm}} \textit{(cor. to 1 d.p.)} \\
\end{align*}
\]

4.text:
\[
\begin{align*}
\text{By the sine law,}& \\
\frac{AC}{sin{13.177^\circ}} &\approx \frac{5 cm}{sin{20^\circ}} \\
AC &\approx \underline{\underline{3.3 cm}} \textit{(cor. to 1 d.p.)} \\
\end{align*}
\]
